data: PED/NEO TM Factor Replacement Hemophilia Bypass Agent (Factor VIIa/FEIBA) (Module)
Blood Products
Orders expire 5 days from order date and time
Indication is hemophilia with known inhibitor. For all other indications, contact TM for approval prior to ordering
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion
Factor rVIIa (Niastase)
Product may not available at all sites. Please contact the hospital Transfusion Service
Blood Product Fact Sheet
Round dose to nearest 1 mg
Administer - Factor rVIIa Transfusion
STAT, Administer: mg, IV direct, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph, once, T;N
Administer - Factor rVIIa Transfusion
